key_features: 10X Rewards Points per S$1 spent in foreign currency, including online spends
5X Rewards Points per S$1 spent in Singapore Dollars for local dining transactions
1X Rewards Points per S$1 on all other spends
1 year annual fee waiver, no minimum spend required
Rewards Points capped at 20,000 points per year

installment: Standard Chartered EasyPay (0% instalment plan for up to 12 months)
Minimum transaction of S$500 required to convert into 0% IPP
A one time service fee of 5% will be charged on the transaction amount
A one time cancellation fee of S$150 is applicable for early repayment or termination of the card
